description: Change of use from grocery shop to grocery shop with hot food takeaway (A1 to A3)
decision_conditions: The proposal would be likely to lead to a materially harmful increase in noise and disturbance to nearby residents arising from the coming and goings of customers including those loitering in the vicinity of the premises.  This harm to residential amenity would conflict with the objectives of Policy ENV1 of the Havering Unitary development Plan.

The proposed use would, by reason of its proximity to residential properties, be likely to create smell disturbance materially harmful to residential amenity.  This would conflict with the objectives of Policy ENV1 of the Havering Unitary Development Plan.
The loss of this unit's existing Class A1 retail use would be harmful to local retail shopping needs and thus contrary to Policy SHP5 of the Havering Unitary Development Plan.
